comment: Professor Bolduc has been great. I have her for ISIC 2001 and 2002 right now. I was worried about taking them both at the same time, but I have high A's in both classes. I have her for asynchronous online: quizzes are open-note and so are tests, take notes on the modules and actually pay attention and you'll get an A. Responds to emails.

I loved professor Bolduc! She was really nice and always very excited and enthusiastic to teach science. We did a lot of fun experiments and a bunch of CERs. Her tests are pretty easy as long as you study for them and pay attention in class. I got an A in her class and I would definitely take her class again if I could. Overall, I enjoyed her class

Dr. Bolduc is so sweet and gives great feedback on everything. If youre willing to come to class and put in the work, the class really isnt a challenge. The tests were a little difficult, but the labs are done in groups and easily make up the test grades if you dont do too well on them!

Professor Bolduc was really sweet and caring. Her tests were kind of hard but since we moved to online classes because of the virus she did include a lot of work. She's a good professor if you're looking for someone to take.

She is really caring. However, I dont think she is the best teacher to take for a science class. After our first test she said both of her classes had an average of only a C. I would only take her if you work REALLY hard because Im often teaching myself the material

Professor Buldoc is amazing and if I could take her for all of my science classes I would. I took it during the summer, along with the other ISCI so it was a lot of work but I managed to get a B. I'm sure you can get an A during a full semester. She is probably the most authentic professor at KSU. You won't regret taking her class!

This was one of the easiest classes I've ever taken. Just keeping up with your interactive notebook will get you a good grade. I took her over the summer so class was fast paced, but still easy. The test are multiple choice and short answer. She was absolutely great. She actually cares. WATCH OUT for errors in your grades. She sometimes messes up

Professor Bolduc was an amazing professor to have for ISCI 2001! She is super caring and provides great feedback in a timely fashion! She makes time to have review sessions outside of class time & really wants to see you succeed! She was truly inspirational and furthered my interest for teaching science! Definitely recommend!!
